message: Why's that?

I'm still looking for an answer to "Y Convore"?
Convore used to be codenamed "Podium"
I've made a Startup Reviews group, https://convore.com/startup-reviews feel free to join that if your looking to for startup chat.

I wonder if there is a way to rate a group as more productive than others...

@bat Sorry, it's probably not going to help about wasting time, unless you leave all the fun groups and only join productivity groups.
@ericflo descriptions*
@bat you'll waste more time on convore... :)
@psytek Headlines?
@psytek Yep, that's intentional.  Otherwise how are your friends going to know to request access to it?
it seems like I'm already wasting too much time on twitter? how's convore going to help?
@ericflo private groups's headlines are visible https://convore.com/convore-developers/info/
ericflo, that's actually not a bad idea :)
